Text: trialNerror, are you a member on everydayparanormal.com? Thx for these ep.

I am a member on that site, but under a different alias.
Great site, too.  You can talk directly to Brad and Barry or other members of EP.  Friendly people.  Interesting stories.  Intriguing photos.  Any fan of the paranormal should join!
P/S:  There *SHOULD* be two more episodes of Ghost Lab before it is officially done with.   At least according to the episode guide there will be.
